msg.msgText:
A "SNMPCommunity" object can be deleted by using the "delete" option of the "imaserver" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver delete SNMPCommunity help imaserver delete SNMPCommunity Name=value
EXAMPLE: imaserver delete SNMPCommunity Name=AdminSubnet

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command help.
